<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AVLPos &amp;&amp; ((</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)i) == &#42;AVLPos)</Highlight></CodeLine>
